pages.text: A special staff decorated with entwined snakes, and the staff of Baphomet. Once relieved of the Goat, the staff can summon spectral Feuerwurms to act as minions of the owner, and if the Demonologist holds the Caduceus while they were to be killed, the Caduceus will miraculously bring them back to life, at a great cost.
The Caduceus cannot be repaired or enchanted
